long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Copy Tracker is a Chrome extension designed to track and manage your copy-paste activities with ease. This extension monitors the last 10 items you have copied and displays them in a convenient list named "Copy Clipboard." Here's why Copy Tracker is a must-have tool for productivity and organization:

Easy Access: With a single click, view your copy history and quickly find the content you need.
Quick Actions: Use the "Copy" button to re-copy any item in the list, or the "Delete" button to remove items you no longer need.
Streamlined Interface: The intuitive and user-friendly design ensures a seamless experience. Icons and visuals guide you through the functionality.
Boost Productivity: Never lose track of important copied items again. Save time and work more efficiently by having your recent copy history at your fingertips.

Install Copy Tracker and take control of your clipboard history today!
